function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper implementation of digital technologies","Impact":"Increased risk of supply chain disruptions and reduced resilience during global pandemics","Mitigation":"Proper training and change management processes to ensure effective adoption of digital technologies","Technologies":"Disruptive digital technologies, IoT, artificial intelligence, big data analytics, cloud computing, 3D printing","People":"Companies, supply chain operators","Owner":"Companies, technology implementation teams"},{"Description":"Security vulnerabilities in digital infrastructure","Impact":"Risk of cyber attacks and data breaches leading to supply chain disruptions","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust cybersecurity measures, regular security audits, and employee training on cybersecurity best practices","Technologies":"IoT, cloud computing, big data analytics","People":"IT teams, cybersecurity experts","Owner":"Companies, IT departments, cybersecurity teams"},{"Description":"Lack of data privacy and compliance with regulations","Impact":"Potential legal and financial repercussions due to non-compliance with data privacy regulations","Mitigation":"Adoption of data privacy protocols, compliance with regulations such as GDPR, and regular audits to ensure adherence to data privacy laws","Technologies":"Big data analytics, cloud computing","People":"Data privacy officers, legal teams","Owner":"Companies, legal and compliance departments"}]}
